ComicInfo.Summary: Trashed! - Part 3: Chas flashes back to his grandfather's funeral then awakes on the garbage patch and discovers he's lost the Hero device. Wandering the patch he discovers a crashed plane and a French female pilot who has the Hero prototype. The Hero device is activated and "Yalafath", the giant squid returns.
ComicInfo.Title: Trashed! - Part 3
